articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: U.S. hedge fund offers Glazers stay at Man Utd - sources - ESPN
articles.description: The Glazer family have been offered the financial backing to remain as Manchester United owners by an American hedge fund, sources have told ESPN.
articles.content: The Glazer family has been offered the financial backing to remain as owners of Manchester United by American hedge fund Elliott Management, sources have told ESPN, after the New York-based group reg… [+2352 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Russia proposes rescue ship launch after space station leak: Reports - The Province
articles.description: Russia's space agency proposed the launch of a ship next week to bring two Russian cosmonauts and an American astronaut back from the ISS.
